storyInfo: The dusty history of Leto's parents finally comes to light, and she judges her father for his past actions. Degenbrecher chases the Trilby Asher relentlessly, until they approach the lake island, and Kjarr asks the Saintess to leave while insisting on staying behind herself.

attributes.content: It was more than twenty years ago.
I remember that winter was so much colder than in previous years. The snow never stopped, and the wind was almost strong enough to blow you away.
The weather was so bad no one would willingly go outdoors.
Everyone stayed inside with their furnaces lit from day to night. There was always tea heating atop the stove for convenient pick-me-ups.
The burdenbeast sheds were specially reinforced before winter came, and the beasts huddled together, hibernating in groups.
Time seemed to slow down in Kjerag that year. Every passing day felt like a slog to go through, and yet the subsequent days would bring the same wind and snow.
I was still young then, and I just couldn't bear to live that way anymore. I snuck out with a few men in tow that day, with a plan to hunt in the mountains.

But the snow overwhelmed us, and there wasn't a single target to be found. I got separated from the others halfway, and could only continue ascending the mountain with all the effort I could barely muster.
And then, it was here...
I met Tatyana on this very spot.
Gah, what lousy weather today!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Don't even have a single strand of meatbeast hair on my hands, Dad's going to call me a...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What's that noise...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Huh! Who's there?!
attributes.name: Arctosz
Arctosz
attributes.content: Enough with your tricks! Come out and face me if you have the guts to—

attributes.name: Arctosz
attributes.content: Yowch!
As if responding to Arctosz's words, a snowball falls from a tree branch up high and hits his head.
A clear female voice rings from above.
Hahaha, right on target.
Hey, I'm over here.
Why didn't you hide, you big dummy?
Y-You..!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Me? What about me?
You're a funny guy. Did you think you'd be able to hunt in weather this bad?
Young man, I'll give you some advice on account of your handsome face.
You should hurry home.
Arctosz raises his head.
The snow and wind gradually subside, and bright rays pierce through the entwined branches of the trees before him, casting fragmented shadows on his face.
A vaguely female figure seems to pop up from a patch of soft snow.
Snowflakes scatter all around as she moves. The young Tatyana smiles as she looks down to meet the young man's gaze below.
Arctosz suddenly feels his eyes go dry.
The snowy white he is so used to is suddenly so dazzling.
The sunlight was so, so bright that day.
Saintess, please have a look!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The main body of Kjeragandr's statue was built by us Browntails. It stands about thirty meters tall, and the adamant materials we used ensure no risk of damage for the next century at the very least.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Hundreds of devotees volunteered to work together with professional craftsmen to carve out the statue's form you see today, so it's surely the most accurate reconstruction of Kjeragandr there is!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Although everyone was arguing about whether Kjeragandr should be humanoid or not... that boorish Arctosz even nearly got into a fight over it...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But I guarantee you, from today onwards, this statue will be the most eye-catching attraction in Kjerag!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Mhm. Thank you for all the hard work.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: *cough* This statue... is the best symbol Kjerag can show to the outside world, and it couldn't have happened without everyone's efforts.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjeragandr will certainly be pleased as well.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Especially with you and your sister, Madam Sciurus.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I've heard the both of you spent a lot of effort on the construction, and practically stayed on-site until it was completed. It must have been difficult.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hmm, hm-hmm...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It wasn't much. Just doing our jobs.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Besides, it's much easier than being forced to study...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Study?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No, no, nothing.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *cough* Well then, Great Saintess. Allow me to give you a tour?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Please follow me!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Saintess, preparations for tomorrow are complete. You should return to Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You're nagging me again, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's rare I get to leave the mountain, so let me stay for a bit longer.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Or are you trying to advise the Saintess on how she should act, just as the Elders do, Kjarr?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I won't ramble away like they do.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Your gravitas only continues to increase, and there is no one to stop you from descending Karlan anymore.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Yesterday you came down to meet Enciodes personally. If this happened in the past, the Elders would have already raised a swift objection.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: They merely fear that I, the Saintess, will have my personal inclinations.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But it is precisely because there is no one controlling me that I cannot hold any bias... and I won't have any personal biases either.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Whether the people here or in the eyes of others, I must represent the whole of Kjerag as Saintess, and not any specific faction or clan.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Saintess...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Even though Enciodes and I don't actually have conflicting opinions on many matters and can agree on many issues regarding Kjerag...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It doesn't mean we can be as close as we were, let alone treat each other as siblings.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I can't do that, and neither can he.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It also... includes my own emotions, but it is not just about that.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: So I thank you for preparing our meal yesterday, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But you need not do that again.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Is it really alright to continue like this, Enya?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Even though you're representing Kjerag now, there are still many who only know of Karlan Trade. Clan Silverash has already started to dip their fingers in every facet of the country, and will only grow stronger in the future.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I have some thoughts on that.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What's important right now is to develop Kjerag as fast as we can. Some matters are just unavoidable, or things I let slide.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: We still need entities like Karlan Trade after all.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Besides, I'm fine with Enciodes keeping himself there for the time being...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But won't it be dangerous to continue like that?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That's why I have my own plans.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh, you mean the new school you've been in charge of the past few years? And the reforms over at the Vine-Bear Court?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's fortunate I realized we have so many wise people here.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Compared to a Kjerag with the voice of a sole Saintess or a single Clan Silverash, wouldn't it be better to have a Kjerag with a myriad of voices of Kjeragandr's people?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's the same as prayer. Didn't you say that making your wishes out loud instead of keeping them in your heart would let Kjeragandr hear them in earnest?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I hope more people will get the chance to voice their hopes for Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This is what I wish for, my prayer to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Well... that's a good wish indeed.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: It will certainly reach Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That's great to hear.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Will you help me, Kjarr?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Of course. Didn't we agree as much already?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'm your maid after all.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Thank you, Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If you really want to thank me, why not...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh dear, they're headed this way.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjarr?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Is someone headed our way?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, with an aggressive aura to boot.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: They're fast... they're heading straight here, hm... it feels like a fight is about to erupt.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Will there be any issues if that happens near the statue?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Who knows.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Anyway, you should return, Great Saintess. We also need to send someone to inform Madam Sciurus as well.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: It'll be bad if you or someone else gets hurt.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I will stay.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: If something happens... oh, it would be terrible if something happened to damage Kjeragandr's statue.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: So let me stay here to keep an eye on things, and I'll make sure 'nothing big' happens to the statue!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Kjarr...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...Hold on, you can't be...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh, they're here! I'll say no more, Saintess, I have to go watch them!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hey, Kjarr!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She's gone.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She can't possibly be... looking for an opportunity to do a little something to the statue?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Is she that unsatisfied with the statue's face...?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This part's easier to walk in, without as many trees around.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Careful, the snow ahead is pretty deep.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Uh, you... are you really my papa?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I-I mean, Mamochka said...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Tatyana mentioned me?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wh-What did she say?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Not much, I didn't even know I still had a papa until I was grown, I thought he might have died long ago.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I thought that was the reason she never mentioned a father, and she never really brought up Kjerag before either.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: We've been just the two of us for all these years, I never thought...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Really...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Maybe, she... she still resented me.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: As she should have! After all, I was the one who let the both of you down back then. I deserve her resentment.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It seems Tatyana lived a good life, even without me...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Before I came here, she told me how the snow feels different in Kjerag. The snow you find on the mountain summits is different from the snow down here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She told me...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Kjerag is my home too, that even though I grew up in Ursus, I was born here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Tatyana...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: That sure is something she would say. She liked the summit snows so much... and always told me how different it was.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's a pity a thug like me didn't get it, back then.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hah, I don't get it either.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But I remember what she told me, I might have forgotten what happened when I was small, but those experiences don't just disappear.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She always said, everything you've been through will always be shaping you as a person.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Even if you forget it, its influence remains.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She said the Rosalind of today has every stage of her life to thank, and even the little insignificant things that happened in-between have also greatly contributed to who I am today.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And that's why even if she couldn't make it here, she hoped that I could at least know a part of me came from Kjerag.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That's what she said, and that's why I'm here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Tatyana...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: When your mother and I first met here, we... you could say it was a mutual attraction. It didn't take long for us to fall in love.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'd hoped to marry Tatyana and spend the rest of our lives together. I was really looking forward to it—I've never wanted anything as much as I did to be with her.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But that was no easy feat in Kjerag, back then.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But why?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If you liked each other, then just stay together. It can't get any simpler than that, right?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yes... it should have been the simplest thing to do.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But Rosalind, you don't understand Kjerag, or at least the way Kjerag was two decades ago.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: We were still secluding ourselves in our little corner of the land, and basically had no contact with outsiders.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You don't get Catastrophes in Kjerag, and everyone thought it was thanks to Kjeragandr protecting Her people. We believed the place was sacred, unlike the outside world, where Catastrophes are commonplace.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I've always believed Kjerag back then was quiet and peaceful.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But the way things are now, I have to admit, we were closed-off, and... blind.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Our lives were just farming, herding, and praying to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Outsiders were rare to see, and we weren't exactly friendly to them either.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So Mamochka...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You know her best, I'm sure.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Tatyana was so passionate, frank, ostentatious, and didn't bother to fit in.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: She captivated me completely.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But at the same time, she was too strange and too different for Kjerag then...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So? Are you trying to tell me you held back because of that? You didn't dare to marry a foreigner?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wait, where'd I come into the picture then? You had me without marrying her?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm serious, beardy. You better not be joking.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind, wait! Don't be hasty... it's not what you think!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It didn't happen like that! Easy now!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Then what happened?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I *cough*, *cough* of course I married your mother!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Many objected to it, but it ultimately wasn't an impossible task. After all, the head of Clan Silverash married a foreigner too.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: My marriage would have been an embarrassment for the Paleroche clan, but I still managed to convince my father, our patriarch at the time, to go through with it.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You met him already, Rosalind. It was him who brought you back home yesterday, even though I was so drunk I didn't recognize you at all.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You mean... That old man...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is my grandfather?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I appreciate that he ultimately let us marry, and kept it a secret from the others too.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: One of my biggest regrets is not inviting more guests to our wedding.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But Tatyana told me it was fine, that she didn't care about the formalities as long as we loved each other. Nothing else mattered, as long as we could be together for good.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And then, we had you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The days I spent together with you two were the best I could have ever imagined.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But our good times didn't last long. The Silverash couple got into an accident soon after you were born.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Kjerag was already in a state of turmoil due to the Silverash reforms, and there were many who regarded them as a thorn in their side.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Most didn't dare to challenge the Tri-Clan Leaders directly, but attacking a foreigner in private was much easier to do.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: They said it was an accident, but truth be told... it was far from that simple.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't know much about it, but I remember the Doctor telling me that the Paleroches are conservative.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: So Clan Paleroche must have been against the reforms too.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm not trying to lecture you now, Rosalind, but there are some things you have a right to know.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It was beneficial for the Paleroches to suppress the Silverashes then, and I alone could not have changed our decision to do so.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So... we Paleroches are the most devout believers and guardians of Kjeragandr, while the Browntails are the astute followers who make sensible decisions.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: While the Silverashes had gone astray and tried to destroy our faith in vain, putting Kjerag in danger.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This was how our three clans were seen back then, and also the way the situation really was in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And I, as the next head of the Paleroche clan, could not harm the family's interests.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: There was not much I could do.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And so you abandoned me and Mamochka.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I did not!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I never abandoned you, and there's no way I would've abandoned Tatyana!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But those people, would they be satisfied with a mere 'accident'?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Silverashes were dead, and I... married an Ursine woman.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: They didn't know how great Tatyana was, and didn't care for her affection towards Kjerag.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: She was just an Ursine woman in the eyes of many, an outsider representing Kjerag's doom.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind, I am a warrior. I've shed so much blood, and have never feared anything.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But back then, all I had were sleepless nights.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Because I finally came to know fear.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I was afraid...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The best choice I could make at the time was to have you leave, to go far away from Kjerag.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Even if we couldn't see each other again, even if I couldn't be by your side anymore.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: For I knew the two of you could live a normal and peaceful life somewhere at least...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Instead of running into any strange accidents somewhere I couldn't see—or even right under my nose.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So I wouldn't be left with just an 'accident'...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: That's the story of me and Tatyana.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind, I owe you and your mother too much. I, Arctosz, will never deny this.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The warrior's weapon falls onto the snow with a muffled sound.
Arctosz takes out his poleaxe, and throws it at his daughter's feet.
Under the sun, it reflects both faces of father and daughter on its blade like a mirror.
Resent me, blame me, I deserve it all.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Berate me, or even strike me with this axe. I won't dodge.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But, then... can you give me another chance, Rosalind?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I... don't mean to make this difficult for you!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I just wanted you to know I still love you both. I did then and I always will.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: My feelings towards you and your mother have never changed.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If you're willing, Rosalind—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Could you... call me father, just once?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Call you... father?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Go to hell! In your dreams!!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: R-Rosalind?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So you talked yourself in circles for a whole day, just for that?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: HUH?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Didn't want to make things difficult for me? You even threw down your rotten axe, because you're so sure I wouldn't use it to cut you open, huh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, that's not what I...!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't care what you meant!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It sounds so neat, convincing your family to let you marry, being forced to make us leave.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah. You think I'm dumb?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: All I can think of hearing your story is how Mamochka dealt with it all.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You left her all alone in a hostile environment for so many years, and she even raised a kid for you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She willingly put herself in danger, even with her life on the line! But you're telling me in the end all she could do was leave??
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Have you ever considered why she, an Ursine, had to endure being treated like that in your Kjerag?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: My mamochka loved to go on adventures, she liked to try new things, she liked to explore anywhere she could. She could never stay in one place for too long.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: She loved making friends, loved shopping, loved to eat all sorts of food.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Could your Kjerag from twenty years ago even satisfy any of that?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Do you care about any of those things at all?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Why does it sound like you're the only character in your story, with nothing else?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You said she's passionate, that she's frank, but I couldn't tell you were talking about Tatyana Yevgenyevna Larina at all!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're happy as long as you have your wife and daughter by your side?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'm blown away that you actually had the guts to say that!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Tatyana...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It was me, it was my...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's too late for tears.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Do you know what life in Ursus was like for us?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Living peaceful lives somewhere? That's enough for you?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Bullshit!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Do you know just how many people were talking behind our backs when Mamochka was raising me on her own?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You couldn't.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I grew up without a papa. Do you know how 'popular' fatherless kids are at school?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You were bullied?! They dared—?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Save it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No one dared bully me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But listen, it had nothing to do with you. It was thanks to my fists. Even General Zima helped me more than you ever did.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ever since I was small, I knew I had to rely on myself because I didn't have a papa. I knew I had to count on my fists to shut up those cowards who only knew how to use their mouths.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Do you know how many fights I got into growing up? Haha, how could you even?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind...! I—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You don't have to speak. It's pointless anyway.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I just wanted to tell you, I don't care whether you were compelled by circumstance, or were trying to bear whatever burdens you had.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Since you were missing from our lives for over a decade, there's no need for you to step up now.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: My papa failed to show up back when I still wanted one.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And now, I don't need one anymore.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're still hoping I'll forgive you?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Still hoping to use me as a bridge to reconnect with my mamochka, and have her forgive you too?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Dream on!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No! I wouldn't dare make such an unreasonable demand!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But I, I just want to do something for you...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: ...No, hold on.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind, what did you just say? Have your mother forgive me?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But isn't she... isn't your mother dead?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You're cursing her too?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Who told you she was dead? HUH?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But didn't you say, you brought her remains back here, and you've been using past tense...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Right, 'remains'...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...'Remains'?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Uh, hold up, let me check.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: ...Uh, I mean, what was it, I brought back a token of hers.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Man, the Kjerag language is hard as hell. I know my pronunciation's a little off, and the tenses might be hard, but is it that bad...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Tatyana is still alive? I-Is she doing well?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Super well. She just broke her leg in a fall right before our trip. That's why I'm here on my own.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But what happened in Chernobog a few years ago... Hmph, forget it. You wouldn't understand, even if I told you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll keep it short. I ran into some trouble a few years ago, and Mamochka ran straight into a Catastrophe to find me... I was pretty lucky to get rescued by Rhodes Island, but she contracted Oripathy.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: How could that...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: So, where do you live now? Rhodes Island...? Right, they can treat Oripathy! So are you two staying with them now? Are they treating you well?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I know the Doctor there! Right, right, I'll get in contact right away!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Give me a break. You can't possibly know the Doctor better than I do.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Whatever, we'll pick this back up later. Another word and I'll lose my temper again.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What's important now is to find our way out of here, and it's no good to let that Victorian run around either, right?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Actually, I came up with an idea and was going to tell you about it, but you interrupted me.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What? How do we get out?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Over there.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You stand on that spot.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: But Rosalind, that's just a cliff—
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Huh? Of course I know that.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Leto stands behind the man claiming to be her father. She raises her leg again and kicks him in the back without a shred of hesitation.
Arctosz, completely unaware, only has a split second to look at her with a startled expression before his figure slips and falls down the cliff.
AHHH—!!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Rosalind, careful—it's—oof!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Damn, you're pretty loud.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Stop yelling, you sound like I was going to end you...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I took a look earlier, and the short drop wouldn't do much with all that snow below.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What's wrong with you Kjerags? Do you guys not do any snowjumping here?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Right—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey, totally unhandsome beardy—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't forget to settle your child support for the past decade or so, I'll send the bill to your clan later—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hah... that felt great.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And now, hmm...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'd better tell the Doctor and the rest what happened here, just to be safe.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sigh. I was supposed to be a tourist here, though, what the hell am I doing?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, I got through.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Are you here yet?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm fine. But there's something I need to tell you...
attributes.name: Leto
